titles.title: Protecting Resort Cities from Discrimination Act of 2013

To prohibit an agency or department of the United States from establishing or implementing an internal policy that discourages or prohibits the selection of a resort or vacation destination as the location for a conference or event, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/8/2013--Introduced. Protecting Resort Cities from Discrimination Act of 2013 - Prohibits a federal agency from establishing or implementing an internal policy that discourages or prohibits the selection of a travel, event, meeting, or conference location because it is perceived to be a resort or vacation destination.
